Package tools.pki.gbay.util.general

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    FileInterface  
    IClassLoadStrategy
    The interface implemented by any classloader selection Strategy used with ClassLoaderResolver API.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ClassLoadContext
    Information context for IClassLoadStrategy.getClassLoader(ClassLoadContext).
    ClassLoaderResolver
    This non-instantiable non-subclassable class acts as the global point for choosing a ClassLoader for dynamic class/resource loading at any point in an application.
    Convertors  
    CryptoFile
    Note: When you construct an CryptoFile Object it automatically reads the file unless you construct for output
    DefaultClassLoadStrategy
    A default implementation of IClassLoadStrategy that should be suitable for a variety of situations.
    FileUtil  
    LastDir  
    PropertyLoader
    A simple class for loading java.util.Properties backed by .properties files deployed as classpath resources.
    ResourceLoader
    A static API that can be used as a drop-in replacement for java.lang.ClassLoader API (the class/resource loading part).
    RuntimeEnvironment  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    CryptoFile.FileLocation  
    CryptoFile.OpenMode
